result.title: The hardest problem. A verbal question which has a mathematical side.
result.content:
A friend asked me a question and I couldn't find a good approach for it. Can you guys help me with the question below?

Number of messages I sent yesterday is:
- less than number of messages I sent 3 days ago,
- more than number of messages I sent 10 days ago.

Maximum how many consecutive days can you say the sentence above as a true statement?
